participant_1.background:
I visited my sister in Canada last fall.
i live in the united states.
i work for the navy.
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done.
i am an aspiring singer.

participant_2.background:
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.
I like to sharpen my blade and practice my sword skills in my free time.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
Doing great, thank you! I recently visited my sister in Canada and had a great time.
That sounds wonderful! I've never been to Canada, but I've heard great things about it.
It's a beautiful country, you should definitely go sometime!
I will definitely keep that in mind! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to sing and I'm an aspiring singer. I also enjoy surfing and spending time outdoors.
That's awesome! I love to learn about the universe and everything in it. I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time! I love learning new things, so I'm sure I'd enjoy doing some of those things with you.
I'd love to show you around sometime!
Awesome! I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun.
